name: Mtn Chaos
description:
Prepare for an exhilarating off-road adventure in Mtn Chaos! Take control of powerful off-road vehicles and conquer treacherous mountain terrain. Barrel through ramps, leap across heart-stopping gaps, and navigate icy slopes, desert dunes, and enchanting forest trails. Dodge menacing obstacles like prickly cacti that drain your health until it reaches zero!

Collect valuable gear coins to unlock a wide range of vehicles, wheels, and upgrades. Customize your ride in the garage with adjustable suspension, engine tuning, and a variety of cosmetic options. Challenge yourself to reach new heights, perfect your jumps, and dominate the leaderboards.

Mtn Chaos offers addictive high-octane racing, skillful maneuvering, and strategic customization. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals, a heart-pounding soundtrack, and intense gameplay. Unleash chaos on the mountains and experience an adrenaline-fueled journey that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

* Multiple levels to unlock as you complete each track
* Best time both offline and online
* Gear coins are the in-game currency to unlock vehicle types, cosmetics, etc
* Day / Night levels
